channel.title: [Solved] NEED HELP
channel.description:
ok i posted earlyer for a good version of linux to host a server and "I Vain I" recomended SuSE so i downloaded SuSE onto a dvd and booted it on my cpu. it seemed to load good once the installation was finished i see a black screen that says grub>. what the heck do i do with this? how do i get to to look like an actual desktop? i type "help" and i got commands but i dont know what do do :( please help!
WILL REP++
